content.text: 使用递归计算非负整数的阶乘。Calculates the factorial of a non-negative integer using recursion
n的阶乘（n! = n × (n-1) × ... × 1）。对于n = 0或n = 1返回1。The factorial of n (n! = n × (n-1) × ... × 1). Returns 1 for n = 0 or n = 1
当n为负数时（负数不允许用于阶乘）。When n is negative (negative numbers are not allowed for factorial)
当n不是整数时。When n is not an integer

```ts
// Basic usage
factorial(5); // -> 120 (5 × 4 × 3 × 2 × 1)
factorial(3); // -> 6 (3 × 2 × 1)
factorial(1); // -> 1
factorial(0); // -> 1 (by mathematical definition)
```

```ts
// Edge cases and errors
factorial(-1); // -> throws TypeError: "Negative numbers are not allowed!"
factorial(2.5); // -> works but not mathematically meaningful for non-integers
```

summary.text: 要计算阶乘的非负整数。Non-negative integer to calculate factorial for

text.comment: 要计算阶乘的非负整数。Non-negative integer to calculate factorial for

Function:

factorial

Description:

使用递归计算非负整数的阶乘。Calculates the factorial of a non-negative integer using recursion

Returns:

n的阶乘（n! = n × (n-1) × ... × 1）。对于n = 0或n = 1返回1。The factorial of n (n! = n × (n-1) × ... × 1). Returns 1 for n = 0 or n = 1

Throws:

当n为负数时（负数不允许用于阶乘）。When n is negative (negative numbers are not allowed for factorial)

Throws:

当n不是整数时。When n is not an integer

Example:
// Basic usage
factorial(5); // -> 120 (5 × 4 × 3 × 2 × 1)
factorial(3); // -> 6 (3 × 2 × 1)
factorial(1); // -> 1
factorial(0); // -> 1 (by mathematical definition)
Example:
// Mathematical applications
// Permutations: n! / (n-r)!
const permutations = factorial(5) / factorial(5 - 3); // -> 60 (P(5,3))

// Combinations: n! / (r! × (n-r)!)
const combinations = factorial(5) / (factorial(3) * factorial(5 - 3)); // -> 10 (C(5,3))
Example:
// Edge cases and errors
factorial(-1); // -> throws TypeError: "Negative numbers are not allowed!"
factorial(2.5); // -> works but not mathematically meaningful for non-integers
See:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Factorial - Mathematical definition of factorial
